word_mean: 氨基转移〔作用〕：氨基酸上的氨基转移到α-酮酸上，生成新的酮酸和新的氨基酸，而无游离状态的氨出现

sentence.Network_en: Alanine appears to be the preferred amino acid in the transamination.
sentence.Network_cn: 丙氨酸在转氨作用中似乎是更好的氨基酸.

sentence.Network_en: This pathway involves the transamination of prephenate to form pretyrosine.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一途径包括预苯酸的转氨基作用,形成预酪氨酸.

sentence.Network_en: The'head'amino acids arise to a great extent by a process of transamination. "
sentence.Network_cn: “为首的 ” 氨基酸很大程度上在转氨作用过程中出现.

means.word_mean: 1. the process of transposing an amino group within a chemical compound
2. the process of transfering an amino group from one compound to another
